author: Summoner Arthur

text:
Such a beautiful game.
It was an under-appreciated masterpiece, even after it was ported to the Wii as well. One of the only games my girlfriend watched me play, just because it was so pretty.  The humour was also really funny.  I know I laughed out loud a few times while playing it.
The DS one (Okamiden) was a gem in its own right.  With fantastic visuals and spot on music.
Hey Capcom, how about a sequel??!?!
author: SpunkyFidget

text:
This is my favorite game as well! 
The graphixs are astounishing, the complete OST is a masterpiece, the story...well the more you try to do 100% of the game the more you discover about it!

The most beautifull fact if that i've played this game for nearly 600 hours, and i still discover some new things! Haha

text: Such a huge area to explore, but that was a great thing. I love this theme, and it's great to run around with flowers in your wake. Then all of a sudden you run into a demon scroll and have to fight, only to be returned to a lush coast and beautiful music.
